txt.en: The Taste of Hobbiton is here! It can be accessed by taking the Horse to the Party Tree at the Michel Delving stable-master, and then taking the Horse to the Taste of Hobbiton from there. The horses are only available during the event.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Have you seen the Taste of Hobbiton yet? I say, it might just be the oddest thing that I have ever laid eyes on. It is certainly worth a visit, if you have not made your way to the Shire yet.\n\n'If you need directions, just find your way to the stable in Michel Delving. A horse there will take you where you need to go while the festival is in town!'

The Taste of Hobbiton can be accessed by taking the horse at the Michel Delving stable-master to the Party Tree, and from there taking the horse to the Taste of Hobbiton. The horses are only available during the event.\n\nYou should head to the Michel Delving's stable, where a horse will take you to the Party Tree.

'Have you seen the Taste of Hobbiton yet? I say, it might just be the oddest thing that I have ever laid eyes on. It is certainly worth a visit, if you have not made your way to the Shire yet.\n\n'If you need directions, just find your way to the stable in Michel Delving. A horse there will take you where you need to go while the festival is in town!'

'It is Dodder Twofoot you seek, at the Taste of Hobbiton. You can get to him by taking a horse from the Stable in Michel Delving to the Party Tree, and then taking the horse to the Taste of Hobbiton.'

'Have you seen the Taste of Hobbiton yet? I say, it might just be the oddest thing that I have ever laid eyes on. It is certainly worth a visit, if you have not made your way to the Shire yet.\n\n'If you need directions, just find your way to the stable in Michel Delving. A horse there will take you where you need to go while the festival is in town!'

A horse there will take you where you need to go while the festival is in town!'

'It is Dodder Twofoot you seek, at the Taste of Hobbiton. You can get to him by taking a horse from the Stable in Michel Delving to the Party Tree, and then taking the horse to the Taste of Hobbiton.'
'Hello! Are you here to try your hand at picking the fastest contestant?'
Talk to Dodder Twofoot (take a horse from the Michel Delving stable to get to the Party Tree, and then take the horse to Taste of Hobbiton)
